publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6284 Kenny MacAskill: The Advice and Assistance and Civil Legal Aid (Transfer of Tribunal Functions) (No. 2) (Scotland) Regulations 2010—That the Justice Committee recommends that the Arbitration and Assistance and Civil Legal Aid (Transfer of Tribunal Functions) (No. 2) (Scotland) Regulations 2010 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-6284 Kenny MacAskill: The Advice and Assistance and Civil Legal Aid (Transfer of Tribunal Functions) (No. 2) (Scotland) Regulations 2010—That the Justice Committee recommends that the Arbitration and Assistance and Civil Legal Aid (Transfer of Tribunal Functions) (No. 2) (Scotland) Regulations 2010 be approved.
